statements: SELECT * FROM game_configurations;
SELECT id, difficulty_level, game_mode FROM game_configurations WHERE difficulty_level = 'Easy';
SELECT game_mode, control_options FROM game_configurations WHERE game_mode = 'Multiplayer' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, game_mode, control_options FROM game_configurations ORDER BY difficulty_level ASC;
SELECT * FROM game_configurations WHERE control_options = 'Keyboard' LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM game_configurations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, difficulty_level, game_mode FROM game_configurations WHERE game_mode = 'Single Player' ORDER BY difficulty_level DESC;
SELECT id, control_options FROM game_configurations ORDER BY control_options ASC;
SELECT * FROM game_configurations WHERE difficulty_level IN ('Easy', 'Medium') AND game_mode = 'Multiplayer';
SELECT id, game_mode, control_options FROM game_configurations WHERE difficulty_level = 'Hard' AND control_options LIKE '%keyboard%';
SELECT * FROM difficulty_levels;
SELECT level_name FROM difficulty_levels WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, level_name FROM difficulty_levels ORDER BY level_name DESC;
SELECT id, level_name FROM difficulty_levels WHERE level_name LIKE 'H%';
SELECT * FROM game_modes ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM difficulty_levels ORDER BY level_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, level_name FROM difficulty_levels WHERE id > 3;
SELECT * FROM game_modes WHERE description LIKE '%multiplayer%' ORDER BY id;
SELECT mode_name, description FROM game_modes WHERE id BETWEEN 2 AND 5;
SELECT id, mode_name, description FROM game_modes WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM difficulty_levels;
SELECT id, difficulty_name FROM difficulty_levels ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, difficulty_name FROM difficulty_levels WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM control_options WHERE id > 5;
SELECT option_name FROM control_options ORDER BY option_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM game_modes WHERE id = 1;
SELECT mode_name FROM game_modes WHERE id > 3 AND id < 7 ORDER BY mode_name DESC;
SELECT option_name, id FROM control_options WHERE option_name LIKE '%mouse%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM difficulty_levels JOIN game_modes ON difficulty_levels.id = game_modes.id;
SELECT id, difficulty_name, mode_name, option_name FROM difficulty_levels JOIN game_modes ON difficulty_levels.id = game_modes.id JOIN control_options ON difficulty_levels.id = control_options.id;
SELECT * FROM difficulty_levels;
SELECT level_name, difficulty_value FROM difficulty_levels ORDER BY difficulty_value DESC;
SELECT mode_name, description FROM game_modes WHERE mode_id = 1;
SELECT option_name, control_type FROM control_options WHERE control_type = 'Keyboard';
SELECT * FROM game_settings WHERE setting_name LIKE '%sound%';
SELECT * FROM difficulty_levels WHERE difficulty_value > 5;
SELECT mode_name, description FROM game_modes ORDER BY mode_name DESC;
SELECT option_name, control_type FROM control_options WHERE control_type = 'Keyboard';
SELECT setting_name, setting_value FROM game_settings WHERE setting_value LIKE '%High%';
SELECT level_name, difficulty_value FROM difficulty_levels ORDER BY difficulty_value DESC, level_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM DifficultyLevels;
SELECT id, level_name FROM DifficultyLevels WHERE id = 1;
SELECT mode_name, mode_description FROM GameModes WHERE id = 2;
SELECT option_name, option_value, option_description FROM ControlOptions WHERE option_value > 5;
SELECT player_id, games_played, highest_score FROM PlayerStatistics ORDER BY games_played DESC;
SELECT * FROM DifficultyLevels;
SELECT id, level_name, level_description FROM DifficultyLevels WHERE id = 1;
SELECT player_id, games_played, highest_score FROM PlayerStatistics ORDER BY highest_score DESC;
SELECT mode_name, mode_description FROM GameModes WHERE mode_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT player_id, games_played, latest_play_date FROM PlayerStatistics WHERE games_played > 10;
